content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today? If you could please let me know your name, we’ll get things started.
My sink has been leaking for two days! If you don’t get someone out here TODAY I will leave such a terrible review you won’t recover! Name is Judith.
Thank you, Judith. I’m sorry to hear about your leak and totally understand your frustration. Could you please provide your address so I can check our team’s availability in your area?
It’s 1846 Cobblestone Avenue, Middleton. I want this fixed TODAY or I’ll write an essay about how slow you people are.
Thank you for providing your address, Judith. One moment while I confirm if we service 1846 Cobblestone Avenue, Middleton.

Judith, I’m very sorry—unfortunately, Middleton is currently outside of our service area, so we won’t be able to send a plumber to your address. I completely understand how disappointing this is and apologize for any inconvenience. If your situation changes or you have another property within our area in the future, we’d be happy to help.
